title: Audit the Data Governance Program
description: An auditor reviews the company's newly established data governance program.

tasks.description: Review the data governance charter and policies to ensure there are clearly defined data owners and stewards for critical data elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that the governance structure is well-documented.

tasks.description: Interview a designated data owner to assess their understanding of their roles and responsibilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data owner for 'Customer Data' can clearly articulate their responsibilities.

tasks.description: Check if a data dictionary or business glossary has been created for critical data elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that a data dictionary has been started but is incomplete, and recommends a plan to complete it.
